name: Milk
notes: Comes from cows and contains no forbidden ingredients.

name: Water
notes: Pure and safe to drink.

notes: Made from fruits and contains nothing forbidden.

name: Apple Juice

name: Tea
notes: A natural drink with no forbidden ingredients.

name: Coffee
notes: A natural drink with no forbidden ingredients.

name: Cola Soda
notes: HALAL because it does not contain alcohol.

name: Energy Drink (with alcohol)
notes: Contains alcohol, which is forbidden.

name: Beer
notes: Contains alcohol, which is forbidden.

name: Wine
notes: Made from fermented grapes and contains alcohol.

notes: HALAL if slaughtered properly.

notes: HALAL if slaughtered properly.

notes: HALAL if slaughtered properly.

notes: HALAL if slaughtered properly.

name: Pork
notes: Muslims are not allowed to eat pork.

name: Bacon

name: Ham

name: Dog Meat
notes: Muslims are not allowed to eat dogs.

name: Cat Meat
notes: Muslims are not allowed to eat cats.

name: Fish
notes: All types of fish are HALAL.

name: Shrimp
notes: Seafood is HALAL to eat.

name: Crab

name: Seaweed

name: Scrambled Eggs
notes: Cooked eggs and safe to eat.

name: Omelette
